mapper.select: select * from DEF_FUNCTION WHERE FUNCTION_CODE IN ( SELECT FUNCTION_CODE FROM DEF_PRIVILEGE WHERE (MASTER_CODE = #{user_code} or MASTER_CODE = #{role_code} or MASTER_CODE = #{group_code}) and enable = 'Y' and isactive = 'Y') and ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND show_order IS NOT NULL AND show_order != "" order by show_order

select * from DEF_ACTION a, DEF_PRIVILEGE p WHERE a.ACTION_CODE = p.ACTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE = p.FUNCTION_CODE AND p.FUNCTION_CODE = #{function_code} AND (p.MASTER_CODE = #{user_code} or p.MASTER_CODE = #{role_code} or p.MASTER_CODE = #{group_code}) and p.enable = 'Y' and p.isactive = 'Y' and a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.ACTION_CODE

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b,DEF_PRIVILEGE p WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.ACTION_CODE = p.ACTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE = p.FUNCTION_CODE AND p.MASTER_CODE = #{role_code} and p.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.show_order

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b,DEF_PRIVILEGE p WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.ACTION_CODE = p.ACTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE = p.FUNCTION_CODE AND p.MASTER_CODE = #{group_code} and p.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.show_order

select * FROM DEF_ACTION a,DEF_FUNCTION b,DEF_PRIVILEGE p WHERE a.FUNCTION_CODE = b.FUNCTION_CODE AND a.ACTION_CODE = p.ACTION_CODE AND a.FUNCTION_CODE = p.FUNCTION_CODE AND p.MASTER_CODE = #{user_code} and p.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' order by a.show_order
